Class HoteleService

java.lang.Object
com.project.springbootjavafx.services.AbstractServices<Hotele,String>
com.project.springbootjavafx.services.HoteleService
@Service public class HoteleService extends AbstractServices<Hotele,String>
The HoteleService class provides service methods for managing hotel entities (represented by the Hotele class) in the application.

This service extends AbstractServices to inherit common CRUD operations and additional functionality. It offers functionality to add a new hotel while enforcing business rules such as checking for duplicate hotel codes and validating that the hotel code is exactly 6 characters long. In addition, it provides a method to retrieve hotels for a specific city.

See Also:

      @Autowired public HoteleService(HoteleRepository hoteleRepository)

  • Method Details

    • add

      public Hotele add(Hotele hotel) throws DuplicatedEntityExceptionn, WrongCodeLengthException
      Adds a new hotel to the database after performing necessary validations.

      This method first checks if a hotel with the given code already exists. If so, it throws a DuplicatedEntityExceptionn. It also validates that the hotel code is exactly 6 characters long; if not, a WrongCodeLengthException is thrown. If all validations pass, the hotel is saved using the repository.

      Specified by:
      add in class AbstractServices<Hotele,String>
      Parameters:
      hotel - the Hotele entity to add
      Returns:
      the saved Hotele entity
      Throws:
      DuplicatedEntityExceptionn - if a hotel with the same code already exists
      WrongCodeLengthException - if the hotel code is not exactly 6 characters long

    • getHoteleMiasta

      public List<Hotele> getHoteleMiasta(Miasta miasto)
      Retrieves a list of hotels located in the specified city.

      This method uses the HoteleRepository to fetch all hotels associated with the given city. The city is provided via a Miasta object, and the method returns a list of Hotele entities for that city.

      Parameters:
      miasto - the Miasta object representing the city
      Returns:
      a list of Hotele entities located in the specified city
